author: Dave Stewart
comment: I have a square face Asus Zen 2 smartwatch.  This is my FAVORITE Watchface so far - the ONLY one I was (yet) willing to pay for.  All the features in the App description work, and perhaps even better than is obvious, they work GREAT. I switched my watch & phone battery indicators to percentages (instead of bars) as I wanted precision.  I'm using a blue background - it shows up great (and power saver ambient mode shows up great too).  Instead of a 2nd time zone in the top right circle - I chose the moon phase, very nice. IF this looks like the watch you want - I suspect and hope you are as satisfied as I am!  LOVE IT!

author: Kram Rhewdnal
comment: Nice faces but weather readings need to update more often. Or be more accurate. (Review has not changed as of 1/18/18)

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi.  We've made significant improvements to the app.  A ton of new features, interactivity, full week forecast plus 1 hr. interval updates and much much more.  Update the app and enjoy all the new things W04 can do.

author: mike s
comment: This utility watch face I have found. It looks nice too.

author: Michael hill
comment: When Bluetooth is off will not stay on the watch have to reinstall!!!! App

comment: Perfect and functional watchable. Highly customizable and great user interface. LOVE it.

comment: not working at all

comment: Great interface

author: David Wolnik
comment: Nice...

author: Mykle Williams
comment: Paid for basically nothing but a menu. Wont show on watch, program wont see watch to set default apps to watch face. Waste of money!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: For Wear 2.0 Watches: Open Play Store on your watch. Scroll down to "Apps on your Phone". Install the watch app from there. Please let us know or email for further assistance forzaonestudios@gmail.com

comment: Very cool...lots of info at a glance.  Works great on my Huawei Watch 2 Classic.

author: Rick Mauer
comment: Great watch face except the weather doesn't update that frequently, and there's no way to change it in the settings. If you could change the weather settings, would be 5 stars.
Great watch face. Developer is great about updating. Thank you!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thank you, we're glad you like it.

author: Bronze Factory Productions
comment: Absolutely love this watch face, one of my faves. Everything about this I adore. Love the idea that whatever colour top I may have on, I can easily match the watch face to. Not a major factor  but cool none the less.  The ONLY thing I would like the devs to add is on the date section. Could we PLEASE have what day it is included on the next update? Even a shortened version like 'Weds'  PLEAAAAAAAAAAAASSSSSSSSSEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!! 😬😬😬😬😬😬😬

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: You got what you asked for Michael.  We've made significant improvements to the app.  A ton of new features, interactivity, full week forecast plus 1 hr. interval updates and much much more.  Update the app and enjoy all the new things W04 can do.

author: Edgar Yuji Egawa
comment: The weather information doesn't refresh according to your location. There's no option to refresh the weather info on the watch interface neither the app on the device. The most frustrating thing is the inaccurate info regarding the humidity, even in a cold dry japanese winter, the watch displays almost all the time 100% humidity.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi.  We've made significant improvements to the app.  A ton of new features, interactivity, full week forecast plus 1 hr. interval updates and much much more.  Update the app and enjoy all the new things W04 can do.

title: Almost perfect

author: Ian toole
comment: I think the Forza watch faces are the best. This new one is good too. My personal preference is its a bit 'busy' for me and I like my watch a bit more minimalistic. I like the weather and battery lives but dont need sunset or sunrise. This is the only reason I gave it 4 / 5. I prefer the W03.

comment: I asked for m/s units for wind speed and it happened overnight! Thank you! Could use one more mod: ability to remove the unit headlines(wind, temp...) so the temp and all could be a bit bigger font. Highly recommended! 😊

title: Excellent face & support!

comment: I love it. Makes my Huawei watch look all the more smarter. I would how ever like to be able to change the temperature (C or F) independently of the wind speed (kph or mph). You see I would like degrees C in the winter, and degrees F in the summer, but always have MPH for the wind speed.. Thanks (EDIT: Changed from 4 to 5 stars. The more I use my watch, the more I like the new face)

title: Not enough customization options

author: Donald Lewis
comment: The guys have really outdone themselves on this one! It's simple intuitive interface is extremely easy to use. I can catch all the info I need at a quick glance. This watch face shows all the pertinent info I need without having to hunt for it. Weather is accurate, battery life is great. I love that I can choose whatever colors I want for the background and text. Forza one makes the best watch faces I've ever seen!

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thank you for such a detailed review Donald.

title: Forza one does it again!

author: Robert Julite
comment: Forza has to be thee premier for watch faces. I love this one for weather design. My only hope is getting S Health to sync with Forza so  the fitness tracker would show. S Health in my opinion is the only fitness app worthy of this company.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi Robert, we will get to the fitness stuff in future faces.  For now we've made significant improvements to the app.  A ton of new features, interactivity, full week forecast plus 1 hr. interval updates and much much more.  Update the app and enjoy all the new things W04 can do.
